response.overview: The streets of Buffalo heat up as Bags and his crew from the West-side search for the culprits behind the murder of Yg's Brother Gamble. Events take a turn once Trish gets caught up with the enemy and have to make a decision that may cost her everything. In this action packed film of money, drugs and deceit, there's no telling who may become the ultimate sacrifice.
response.title: Pure (The Movie Series) pt. 2
